author: hny
content:
The food was very tasty, reasonably priced, and in good quantity.
The restaurant was very popular with a quick turnover of customers.

I enjoyed it, but my wife couldn't finish it because it was too spicy, and my 3-year-old son ate only rice because it was too spicy.
It was a huge portion, but we ate it all up silently and without complaint.
Be careful with children.
